name: MidnightZap
description:
Ad free, all black background with light gray links and cyan text.  I've sized the font for a screen resolution of 800x600 pixels.  If you've got a larger screen resolution just use your browser controls to increase the text size...  

Your favorite shows are styled with a maroon background  ~ sports with dark purple ~ movies with dark navy ~ news with a dark gray ~ & kid's shows with a hunter green background...
